prod.full_name:
Jordan 1 Retro High
Hyper Royal Smoke Grey
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Air Jordan/1/High/Jordan 1 Retro High OG Hyper Royal
prod.desciption:
Jordan Brand added a new colorway to their Jordan 1 catalog in the spring of 2021 with the Air Jordan 1 Hyper Royal. The Hyper Royal utilizes material selection and color blocking to provide a vintage feel, similar to the 2019 Air Jordan 1 High Turbo Green.

The upper of the Air Jordan 1 Hyper Royal is constructed with white leather and distressed Hyper Royal suede overlays while the Swoosh and panels around the ankle are made with a Light Smoke Grey Durabuck. Consistent with Jordan 1s of the past, a classic white �Wings� logo appears on the lateral ankle. A blue woven Nike Air label stitched on the tongue, a white midsole, and a Light Smoke Grey outsole add the finishing touches to this retro design.

The Air Jordan 1 Hyper Royal released in April of 2021 and retailed for $170.
